item.description:
Einstein’s Relativity

Science for the Public

Lecture Series

November 09, 2010

DR TEREASA BRAINERD

: : :


Assoc. Professor and Assoc. Chair, Boston University Astronomy Dept; Director, Institute for Astrophysical Research

Dr. Brainerd will explain some of the fascinating, and perhaps unsettling, consequences of Einstein’s theories of Special Relativity and General Relativity. Her talk will include an explanation of how gravity affects time and space, and how time travel into the future is theoretically possible on a very fast spaceship.

7:00 to 8:00 PM at Cambridge Public Library main branch, 449 Broadway, Cambridge

Light refreshments
item.name: Einstein’s Relativity
